item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-12-09
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Things I learned from iPhone and Droid ads - #
  • I'm at Starbucks (Waban) (474 Woodward Street, Waban). #
  • Been working on redesigning the Book details page for @fictfact. Making good looking websites is hard work! #
  • I'm at Lee's Place Burgers (216 summer st, Newton Centre). #
  • Upgrading to Thunderbird 3 (crosses fingers) #

Powered by Twitter Tools
